page.description: Create an index on the specified table in the currently connected database using the TableInfo and IndexInfo specifications.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = CreateIndex(TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo, IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo)

return.name: Result_Flag
return.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The CreateIndex() method creates an index on the specified table in the currently connected database using the TableDef and IndexDef specifications.
